examples.example: 这袋大米重十千克，足够我们吃一段时间了。

translate.english: This bag of rice weighs ten kilograms and is enough for us to eat for a period of time.

examples.example: 我今天买了两千克苹果，准备榨成果汁喝。

translate.english: I bought two kilograms of apples today and am going to make them into juice to drink.

examples.example: 我买了五千克的水果，准备和朋友们一起分享。

translate.english: I bought five kilograms of fruit and am going to share it with my friends.
